name: iotflow-dashboard
description: Enterprise IoT Management Platform - Production Ready Dashboard

scripts.install:all: cd iotflow-backend && npm install && cd ../iotflow-frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd iotflow-backend && npm run build 2>/dev/null || echo 'Backend build skipped' && cd ../iotflow-frontend && npm run build
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "cd iotflow-backend && npm start" "cd iotflow-frontend && npm run serve"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd iotflow-backend && npm run dev" "cd iotflow-frontend && npm start"
scripts.test: cd iotflow-backend && npm test && cd ../iotflow-frontend && npm test
scripts.deploy: npm run install:all && npm run build:all && npm run start:prod

author: IoTFlow Team
